name: Wyzard
description:
Welcome to the world of wyzard where your on a quest to kill the gargoyle king and his minions.

Journey through the tower and discover things never discovered before by other adventurers

Game made during MY FIRST GameJam(not my first game jam thats just what the gamejam is called)

[Controls]

WASD to move

Shift to run

When near a teleporter press "E" to teleport

left click to fire.

Press "Tab" While in game to Pause.

[Rant not really important]

making this game was hard at first but i got used to using 3d spaces pretty quickly and also this was a test on my ai programming skills. and 3D programming skills overall. any way thanks for reading this rant oh one more thing i love programming.
